verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>hear<s%> thee in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble;<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7682>defend<s%> thee;
Send <S%H7971><s%> thee <S%H5828>help<s%> from the <S%H4480>sanctuary,<s%> <S%H6944><s%> and <S%H5582>strengthen<s%> thee out of <S%H4480>Zion;<s%> <S%H6726><s%>
Grant <S%H5414><s%> thee according to thine own <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and <S%H4390>fulfill<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H6098>counsel.<s%>

We will <S%H7442>rejoice<s%> in thy <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> and in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> we will set up our <S%H1713>banners:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4390>fulfill<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H4862>petitions.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> I <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3467>saveth<s%> his <S%H4899>anointed;<s%> he will <S%H6030>hear<s%> him from his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4480>heaven<s%> <S%H8064><s%> with the <S%H3468>saving<s%> <S%H1369>strength<s%> of his right <S%H3225>hand.<s%>

Some <S%H428><s%> trust in <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H428>some<s%> in <S%H5483>horses:<s%> but <S%H587>we<s%> will <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>
They <S%H1992><s%> are brought <S%H3766>down<s%> and <S%H5307>fallen:<s%> but <S%H587>we<s%> are <S%H6965>risen,<s%> and stand <S%H5749>upright.<s%>
